section.p: These sections in the clouds.yaml file are the absolute minimum required. Installing each service will require adding sections to the file, which is documented in the installation for that service. A complete clouds.yaml file is available here for reference.
section.note: This basic information is also the minimum required for listing the content from HDN, which is used as a test to determine if the HDPI was installed correctly.
section.codeblock: clouds: mycloud: codn_username: codn_password: region_name: region1 cacert: auth: auth_url: <identity url> project_name: < admin project name> username: < admin user name> password: < admin password>

dlentry.dd: The username for the HDN (Helion Download Network) account. (The name of the download network used to be CODN.)
The password for the HDN (Helion Download Network) account. (The name of the download network used to be CODN.)
The location where the SSL certificates can be accessed.
This URL can be found in Horizon at: Project Compute > Access & Security > API Access or Copy the Service Endpoint URL for the Identity Service. Note that this must be https, not simply http.
The Name of the admin project in Horizon.
The Username of an account with installation privileges (administrator role).
The Password for the same account with installation privileges (administrator role).
